<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-riscvmergebaseoffset-cpp-/riscvmergebaseoffsetopt/#a9a38815bbba88adcb150feb9543a8604">RISCVMergeBaseOffsetOpt::ID</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66" lineLink="#a1479c4cd799c1d374d1c82afeeb60b1e"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#af807c9595d50b45c0008924c4679c85c">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-riscvmergebaseoffset-cpp-/riscvmergebaseoffsetopt/#a4b07f12c05880bf211dbafdef5599a4d">RISCVMergeBaseOffsetOpt</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="#a9a65ea11da1e0dd0712bfe5e7ea8bdb4">RISCV&#95;MERGE&#95;BASE&#95;OFFSET&#95;NAME</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detect either of the patterns:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 (medlow pattern):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   lui   vreg1, %hi(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addi  vreg2, vreg1, %lo(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 (medany pattern):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .Lpcrel&#95;hi1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   auipc vreg1, %pcrel&#95;hi(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addi  vreg2, vreg1, %pcrel&#95;lo(.Lpcrel&#95;hi1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pattern is only accepted if:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    1) The first instruction has only one use, which is the ADDI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    2) The address operands have the appropriate type, reflecting the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       lowering of a global address or constant pool using medlow or medany.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    3) The offset value in the Global Address or Constant Pool is 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">bool <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-riscvmergebaseoffset-cpp-/riscvmergebaseoffsetopt/#a4b07f12c05880bf211dbafdef5599a4d">RISCVMergeBaseOffsetOpt</a>::<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-riscvmergebaseoffset-cpp-/riscvmergebaseoffsetopt/#abc0d1f80e2a83982dbc789e2071db4cb">detectFoldable</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>.getOpcode() != RISCV::LUI &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>.getOpcode() != RISCV::AUIPC &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>.getOpcode() != RISCV::PseudoMovAddr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detect patterns for large offsets that are passed into an ADD instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the pattern is found, updates the offset in Hi and Lo instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and deletes TailAdd and the instructions that produced the offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     Base address lowering is of the form:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       Hi:  lui   vreg1, %hi(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       Lo:  addi  vreg2, vreg1, %lo(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       /                                  \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      /                                    \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     /                                      \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    /  The large offset can be of two forms: \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1) Offset that has non zero bits in lower      2) Offset that has non zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     12 bits and upper 20 bits                      bits in upper 20 bits only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   OffseLUI: lui   vreg3, 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OffsetTail: addi  voff, vreg3, 188                OffsetTail: lui  voff, 128</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    \\                                        /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     \\                                      /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                      \\                                    /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       \\                                  /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                         TailAdd: add  vreg4, vreg2, voff</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-riscvmergebaseoffset-cpp-/riscvmergebaseoffsetopt/#a3a67d4b5306c3571138e241d77393283"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-riscvmergebaseoffset-cpp-/riscvmergebaseoffsetopt/#a3a67d4b5306c3571138e241d77393283">RISCVMergeBaseOffsetOpt::foldLargeOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;TailAdd,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> GAReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((TailAdd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() == RISCV::ADD) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected ADD instruction!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Rs = TailAdd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Rt = TailAdd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg = Rs == GAReg ? Rt : Rs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can&#39;t fold if the register has more than one use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Reg.isVirtual() || !MRI-&gt;hasOneUse(Reg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This can point to an ADDI(W) or a LUI:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;OffsetTail = &#42;MRI-&gt;getVRegDef(Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OffsetTail.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() == RISCV::ADDI ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OffsetTail.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() == RISCV::ADDIW) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The offset value has non zero bits in both %hi and %lo parts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detect an ADDI that feeds from a LUI instruction.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-riscvmergebaseoffset-cpp-/riscvmergebaseoffsetopt/#a50909d8061c5dc33ef5e9d41a00520c4">foldOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, TailAdd, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detect patterns for offsets that are passed into a SHXADD instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The offset has 1, 2, or 3 trailing zeros and fits in simm13, simm14, simm15.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The constant is created with addi voff, x0, C, and shXadd is used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fill insert the trailing zeros and do the addition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the pattern is found, updates the offset in Hi and Lo instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and deletes TailShXAdd and the instructions that produced the offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hi:         lui     vreg1, %hi(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lo:         addi    vreg2, vreg1, %lo(s)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OffsetTail: addi    voff, x0, C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TailAdd:    shXadd  vreg4, voff, vreg2</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RISCV::ADD:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The offset is too large to fit in the immediate field of ADDI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This can be in two forms:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) LUI hi&#95;Offset followed by:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ADDI lo&#95;offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    This happens in case the offset has non zero bits in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    both hi 20 and lo 12 bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) LUI (offset20)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    This happens in case the lower 12 bits of the offset are zeros.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-riscvmergebaseoffset-cpp-/riscvmergebaseoffsetopt/#a3a67d4b5306c3571138e241d77393283">foldLargeOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cad6e9c0ff694f0fca0222e79e772b647e">Tail</a>, DestReg);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hi:   lui vreg1, %hi(foo)          ---&gt;  lui vreg1, %hi(foo+8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lo:   addi vreg2, vreg1, %lo(foo)  ---&gt;  lw vreg3, lo(foo+8)(vreg1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 (medany pattern):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hi: 1:auipc vreg1, %pcrel&#95;hi(s)         ---&gt; auipc vreg1, %pcrel&#95;hi(foo+8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lo:   addi  vreg2, vreg1, %pcrel&#95;lo(1b) ---&gt; lw vreg3, %pcrel&#95;lo(1b)(vreg1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tail: lw vreg3, 8(vreg2)</span></CodeLine>
